alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Brazoria Islands; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Galveston Island; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 11:28AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A thunderstorm may produce small hail over portions of Galveston, central Brazoria and southeastern Harris Counties through NOON CST... At 1127 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm near Richwood, or near Angleton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... League City, Galveston Causeway, Galveston Island West End, Texas City, southern Friendswood, Lake Jackson, Alvin, Angleton, Dickinson, La Marque, Santa Fe, northwestern Freeport, southern Seabrook, Clute, Webster, Hitchcock, West Columbia, Kemah, Galveston Pier 21 and Nassau Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bolivar Peninsula; Brazoria Islands; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Galveston Island; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston
